p: Zanthoxylum armatum, commonly known as the winged prickly ash, is a deciduous shrub which grows throughout southeast Asia and North America. While it has been used for many medicinal purposes, in India it is used as a chewing stick [ 37, 69], and the seeds are chewed to cure toothache [ 70]. In this study, the ethanol extract of Z. armatum fruits and seeds had an MIC of 16 Î¼g/mL and SI >32.
